title: client running like crap
body: So throught the last week ive literally have been "afk" three or more times because my client will suddenly start skipping randomly so hard i cant play when i try to reset it my entire computer freezes. this has literally not been an issue until the last few patches has anyone had this same issue and does anyone know any fixes

replies.body:
Hi friend, I've found out why this happens. 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/UfOcZHUI-client-lol-client-major-bug-with-video-proof

Since I've included video proof, plz upvote so RIOT can fix it. It will also help you understand what happened better.

List your specs: OS, hardware, software, monitor/display settings?

It could be related to the game or another software update/change. Impossible to say without more information, as it does not appear to be a common issue.
